content: In a procedure I can specify which Practitioner took which role in a Procedure --> Procedure.performer.function. In a ServiceRequest I can also specify the requested performers, but not the function. Wouldn't it make sense to specify, in what function a performer is requested and to have it similar like in a Procedure? https://build.fhir.org/servicerequest-definitions.html#ServiceRequest.performerType is in my opinion not very useful to do so.
